entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 30
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
